/usr/local/CLion/bin/cmake/linux/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/local/avr/bin/avr-gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/local/avr/bin/avr-g++ -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=ArduinoToolchain.cmake -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /data/git/ECA-Arduino-Project

-- Current programmer is: avrispmkII
-- Current upload port is: usb

-- Current MCU is set to: atmega8
-- Current H_FUSE is set to: 0xd9
-- Current L_FUSE is set to: 0xc3

-- Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH to /usr/local/avr/include
